attributes.action: Make it a legal requirement for all UK citizens resident in the UK to vote at all elections.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All resident UK citizens should be required to attend a polling station to vote in all elections, both local and national. Failure to attend should result in a fine. 
Although it is not posible to force people to vote, If they have to make an effort to either register for a Postal vote or turn up at the polling both people are more likely to cast a vote.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
